participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.background: I want to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren. My family and I have a special bond, even though I talk in my sleep. I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in. I miss my family but I enjoy my job and my hobbies. My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.background: I love the website The Spruce because it has so many great tips for cleaning everything in my home, including my glasses! I have to be careful around my cat when I'm tending to my flower beds, because I've knocked over some pots of flowers in the past. I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love animals and the outdoors. I have no siblings and I would rather go swimming than worry about my appearance. I like the movie Godfather.

content.text: I'm going to be moving to a new house soon, and I'm really excited about it. I think it's going to be a lot of fun to decorate and make it my own.
That sounds awesome! I love decorating my house. I'm always looking for new ideas and tips.
Me too! I love going on Pinterest and looking at all the different ideas people have.
I've never been on Pinterest, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely check it out! It's a great resource for finding inspiration and ideas for all kinds of things.
I will! Thanks for the tip.
No problem! So, what are some of your hobbies?
I love to garden, go swimming, and read.
That's great! I love gardening too. I'm not very good at it, but I love the process.
Me too! It's so relaxing and rewarding to watch your plants grow and thrive.
I agree! I also love to read. I'm always looking for new books to read.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction and mysteries.
I love mysteries too! I'm currently reading a book by Agatha Christie.
Oh, I love Agatha Christie! She's one of my favorite authors.
Me too! I've read so many of her books.
I have too! She's such a great writer.
